content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.reconwaybill') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.reconwaybill
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.reconwaybill (
[v1ID] int,
[v1Date] datetime2(7),
[v1CustomerID] int,
[v1BService] nvarchar(4000),
[v1CService] nvarchar(4000),
[v1OriginID] nvarchar(4000),
[v1DefUser] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Distance] float,
[v1CourierID] nvarchar(4000),
[v1CourierWBNo] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Weight] numeric(36,6),
[v1Volume] float,
[v1VolumetricWeight] numeric(36,6),
[v1ChargeWeight] numeric(36,6),
[v1BillType] int,
[v1NoOfParcels] int,
[v1CapDate] datetime2(7),
[v1Surcharge] numeric(36,6),
[v1Insurance] numeric(36,6),
[v1Tax] numeric(36,6),
[v1TotalCharge] numeric(36,6),
[v1DestinationName] nvarchar(4000),
[v1OrderType] int,
[v1PickupCustID] int,
[v1DeliverCustID] int,
[v1BillTo] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Claimable] int,
[v1Override] int,
[v1VehicleCapacity] int,
[v1CustPODDate] datetime2(7),
[v1PODDate] datetime2(7),
[v1Signee] nvarchar(4000),
[v1GRVNo] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Endorsements] nvarchar(4000),
[v1BillCust] int,
[v1COURIER_FROM] nvarchar(4000),
[v1COURIER_TO] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Charge] numeric(36,6),
[v1TVALUE] numeric(36,6),
[v1InService] datetime2(7),
[v1DBTotalCharge] numeric(36,6),
[v1LoadID] int,
[v1RouteID] int,
[v1mrpFlag] int,
[v1Printed] int,
[v1SReasonID] int,
[v1MinKg] numeric(36,6),
[v1MinRate] numeric(36,6),
[v1Addrate] numeric(36,6),
[v1DocFees] numeric(36,6),
[v1Volumetric] numeric(36,6),
[v1HasPrinted] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Site] nvarchar(4000),
[v1DeliveryNo] int,
[v1FuelLevy] numeric(36,6),
[v1TotFuelLevy] numeric(36,6),
[v1CustAccID] int,
[v1PODADDED] datetime2(7),
[v1Scanned] int,
[v1UserID] int,
[v1Autoprinted] int,
[v1PodUserID] int,
[v1ScanUserID] int,
[v1cref] nvarchar(4000),
[v1UShort] int,
[v1Delays] nvarchar(4000),
[v1DeBriefed] int,
[v1DeBriefDt] datetime2(7),
[v1DBCtnsRet] int,
[v1Uploaded] int,
[v1ServiceExclude] int,
[v1Failed] int,
[v1PODURL] nvarchar(4000),
[v1DelayReasonID] int,
[v1NotDebrievReasonID] int,
[v1DeliveryStatID] int,
[v1ReasonGroupID] int,
[v1eMailCust] int,
[v1MobileIssueReportedID] int,
[v1isMobile] int,
[v1CustComment] nvarchar(4000),
[v1CustFeedback] int,
[v1ReasonDetailID] int,
[v1MobileComments] nvarchar(4000),
[v1InServiceReasonID] int,
[v1NotDebrievCom] nvarchar(4000),
[v1CallProgID] int,
[v1LastUpdate] datetime2(7),
[v1Dropsequence] int,
[v1Noofparcelssreturned] int,
[v1lat] float,
[v1lng] float,
[v1SignatureURL] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Comment] nvarchar(4000),
[v1ORVCode] int,
[v1DeliverBy] datetime2(7),
[v1ORVStatus] nvarchar(4000),
[v1podpdf_base64] nvarchar(4000),
[v1podsignature_base64] nvarchar(4000),
[v1ToLocID] int,
[v1NoEndorsementsFLag] int,
[v1ORVDebriefDate] datetime2(7),
[v1debrifmode] nvarchar(4000),
[v1ORVCustComment] nvarchar(4000),
[v1ORVCustFeedback] nvarchar(4000),
[v1ORVPODDate] datetime2(7),
[v1PclsLoaded] int,
[v2id] bigint,
[v2customerid] bigint,
[v2puid] bigint,
[v2delid] bigint,
[v2manifestid] bigint,
[v2status] nvarchar(4000),
[v2loadsequence] int,
[v2cref] nvarchar(4000),
[v2cref2] nvarchar(4000),
[v2insdate] bigint,
[v2moddate] bigint,
[v2scandate] bigint,
[v2debriefdate] bigint,
[v2poddate] bigint,
[v2customerpoddate] bigint,
[v2uploaddate] bigint,
[v2numpcls] int,
[v2signee] nvarchar(4000),
[v2grvno] nvarchar(4000),
[v2endorsment] nvarchar(4000),
[v2customerfeedback] nvarchar(4000),
[v2customernote] nvarchar(4000),
[v2comment] nvarchar(4000),
[v2uuid] nvarchar(4000),
[v2extpodurl] nvarchar(4000),
[v2orvcode] nvarchar(4000),
[v2orvstatus] nvarchar(4000),
[v2orvdebriefdate] bigint,
[v2orvpoddate] bigint,
[v2orvcustcomment] nvarchar(4000),
[v2orvcustfeedback] nvarchar(4000),
[v2insby] bigint,
[v2scanby] bigint,
[v2debriefby] bigint,
[v2legacyid] bigint,
[v2puibtcount] int,
[v2pucollectcount] int,
[v2migrationstatus] nvarchar(4000),
[v2customername] nvarchar(4000),
[v2puname] nvarchar(4000),
[v2delname] nvarchar(4000),
[v2weight] float,
[v2type] nvarchar(4000),
[v2debriefmode] nvarchar(4000),
[notinv2] int,


	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/LMSV2/reconwaybill.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.reconwaybill 
GO
